reason: Bitcoin has broken crucial $70,000 support amidst high volatility, strong bearish institutional predictions, and potential selling pressure from state actors. The immediate trend is downwards, suggesting further testing of lower support levels.
headlines: Stifel predicts bitcoin crash to $38,000. Yes, you read it right.
